Map

General class for maps to be shown on Window().
class game.map.Map(player: object, drawing: dict, layout: object, collition: list, actionList: list, onlinePlayer: dict = {}, timediff: float = 0.16)¶

Bases: game.view.View

General class for maps to be shown on Window().

Inherits from View.

addOPlayer(key: str, obj: object) → None¶

Adds online player.

NOTE: Work in progress.

Args:

key (str): Key for the online player. obj (object): Object of the player block.

removePlayer(key: str) → None¶

Removes online player.

NOTE: Work in progress.

Args:

key (str): Key of the player.

drawPlayers(screen_: object) → None¶

Draws all the players on the screen.

Args:

screen_ (object): Main Window() object.

action(**kwargs) → None¶

Does the action and controls the player. Will be called every frame.
